cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB_ID to an invalid hexadecimal value '0xinvalid' will cause parsing errors and configuration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Changing the SSB periodicity to 10, which is outside the valid range (0-7), will cause cell configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 週期更改為 10，這超出了有效範圍 (0-7)，將導致細胞配置失敗。
